author: Cryptocaeser
title: Bakground
description: Bakground stands to disrupt and legitimize the NFT space.

assessments.note: NFTs core principal is that they can't be faked and are forever on the blockchain. It could be hard to tell for an average user. So maybe an authenication programm is a good idea.
No detailed plan on what will be produced.

Sounds exciting idea and another Ethereum person to have on board and I prescribe integration and landing process to accommodate Cryptoceaser into the P2P environment and join the community in a more collaborative style. Details of his proposal are virtually non-existent:(
Draft proposal. There is no plan. There is no way to assess the impact on the challenge. I recommend including more details for appropriate feedback.
Due to the missing info, it's hard to assess how scanning audio and image files for authenticity could lead to a wider adoption of Cardano.
There are no technical details, nothing about the team and no plan or budget for the requested funds

No evidence of technical capacity of the proposer or any details on what would be done. How will you use AI and ML to scan for authenticity? What is the oracle to be compared to. How does this integrate with NFTs?
Could well be! Although we have insufficient feedback to engage the proposal at this stage I would like to hear more from this proposer..
Draft proposal. There is not enough information about the proposer and there is no plan. There is no way to assess feasibility. I recommend including more details for appropriate feedback.
The proposer claims to have already built 3 apps and 1 Ethereum based app, yet doesn't provide any link to verify. There is no plan provided, only one short sentence describing his idea.
The proposal contains only 3 sentences, which unfortunately makes an audit impossible. I would recommend to re-do this proposal for the next fund.
Please provide detailed plan on what will actually be done and why you are capable of delivering it.
Not at all unfortunately and I sort of feel its the CA fault as no comments have helped this proposer to integrate and engage..
Draft proposal. There is no information available to evaluate auditability.
While the problem solution is intriguing, there is no detailed plan to back it up and to give it more context. Suggest re-submission with the missing info added.

solution: By using Artificial intelligence and Machine learning to scan Audio and image files for authenticity.
experience: I've had 3 apps built and launched and 1 Ethereum based Dapp built and launched.
